Replace.Text: One of the two empresses who ruled Leithanien. May seem like a gentle "eternal grace," but in reality, she acted with firmness and ruthlessness. I hope to take the sunset as my own, condone the entire incident, and clear obstacles for my own power.

The "Original Horn", he is the most talented and capable sorcerer in the history of Terra. Rewriting the Golden Melody removed the melody of Siracusa, allowing it to remain independent while maintaining the stability of Leithanien. He is also the only king to have changed the Golden Melody to date.
